ezLogger.title: ezPAARSE Logger
ezLogger.waitingForTraffic: Waiting for traffic, let's browse the Internet !
ezLogger.getTheExtension: Nothing shows up ? Download the ezPAARSE Logger extension !
ezLogger.exportDesc: Click below to export the traffic you captured as a standard log file. This file can be processed in ezPAARSE without any configuration.
ezLogger.exportUseSearch: Please note that the search field is taken into account.
ezLogger.captureLimitReached: You reached the capture limit, the oldest requests will now be replaced by the new ones.

ezLoggerSettings.nationalInstanceDesc: The public instance is hosted on http://ezpaarse-preprod.couperin.org and always provides the latest version of ezPAARSE.
ezLoggerSettings.name: Name
ezLoggerSettings.patchHyphensDesc: If your proxy replaces dots with hyphens, check "patch hyphens" to duplicate lines in order to generate all possible URLs.
ezLoggerSettings.defaultParserDesc: Unrecognized URLs will be analyzed by this parser. Allows for processing logs of a specific platform without worrying about the proxy suffixes.
ezLoggerSettings.failedToFetchParsers: Failed to fetch the parser list
ezLoggerSettings.error_no_response: The ezPAARSE instance is not available

card.archiveDesc: The platform will be archived and the analyses won't be visible anymore. To undo this action, restore the associated card from the Trello board.
card.publisherVerified: Has been compared with the publisher's statistics

analyses.title: Title
analyses.name: Name
analyses.deleteDesc: You are going to delete the analysis.

domainCheck.supported: The domain {domainName} is already supported by the parser {cardName}.
domainCheck.unsupported: The domain {domainName} has no associated parser yet.
domainCheck.pleaseType: Enter a domain name that can host resources.

badges.title: My badges
badges.error: An error occurred, we can't recover your badges for the moment.
badges.shareInYourNetwork: Share the badge in your network as an update.
badges.thisCertificationDoesNotExpire: Mark : This certification does not expire
badges.copyPast: Copy and paste the information into the corresponding fields.
badges.owned: The person already has this badge
badges.badgeNotFound: No badge found with that name.
badges.searchNotFound: Your search for {search} found no results.
badges.errorPing: So it is not possible to issue badges!
badges.noMetrics: So it is not possible to load the badges list!

certifications.notCertified: This platform is not yet certified
certifications.publisherCertificationsError: H certification is required to be able to certify P the platform
